text:
Is it possible to add multiple conditions to a field when building a custom module in the design manager?

I have a module with two sections named: Show 1 Column, Show 2 Columns with a divider between the two.

I only want to display the divider if the editor is using both 1 column and 2 column layout.

Is it possible to setup these conditions in the design manager or is it only possible via CLI?
